original_text: Howbeit Jesus suffered him not, but saith unto him, Go home to thy friends, and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee, and hath had compassion on thee.
korean_text: 허락하지 아니하시고 그에게 이르시되 집으로 돌아가 주께서 네게 어떻게 큰 일을 행하사 너를 불쌍히 여기신 것을 네 가족에게 알리라 하시니

sentences.original_text: how great things the Lord hath done for thee
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 너를 위해 얼마나 큰 일을 행하셨는지

sentences.original_text: and hath had compassion on thee
